intent.user_query: What is the average sale amount per month in the year 2023?

phases.goal:
Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS SaleMonth, AVG(TotalAmount) AS AverageSaleAmount
FROM fitness_db.Sales
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) = 2023
GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate)
ORDER BY SaleMonth;

arguments.sql:
SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS SaleMonth, AVG(TotalAmount) AS AverageSaleAmount
FROM fitness_db.Sales
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) = 2023
GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate)
ORDER BY SaleMonth;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
